channel.title: Sample Threat Intelligence Feed
channel.description: Sample RSS feed for testing IntelGraph connector

item.title: Critical Vulnerability Discovered in Web Framework
item.description: Researchers have discovered CVE-2024-12345 affecting popular web frameworks. The vulnerability allows remote code execution via malicious payloads sent to vulnerable endpoints.
item.author: security@example.com

item.title: New Malware Campaign Targets Financial Institutions
item.description: A sophisticated malware campaign has been observed targeting financial institutions. The malware communicates with C2 server at 192.168.1.100 and uses domain evil-example.com for data exfiltration. Hash: a1b2c3d4e5f6789012345678901234567890abcd
item.author: threat-intel@example.com

item.title: Phishing Campaign Uses Spoofed Email Addresses
item.description: Security researchers have identified a phishing campaign using spoofed email addresses including fake-admin@legitimate-bank.com to steal credentials. The campaign redirects victims to phishing-site.evil domain.
item.author: phishing-research@example.com
